languages.text: Непосредственная угроза жизни устранена. Необходимо решение касательно дальнейшей участи нестабильного спутника Лорд-капитана.

traits.locale_text: Непосредственная угроза жизни устранена. Необходимо решение касательно дальнейшей участи нестабильного спутника Лорд-капитана.

languages.text: The immediate threat to the crew has been neutralised. A decision has to be made regarding the fate of the Lord Captain's unstable companion.
languages.original_text: Непосредственная угроза жизни устранена. Необходимо решение касательно дальнейшей участи нестабильного спутника Лорд-капитана.

traits.locale_text: The immediate threat to the crew has been countered. A decision has to be made regarding the fate of the Lord Captain's unstable companion.
The immediate threat to the crew has been countered. A decision has to be made regarding the fate of the Lord Captain's unstable companion.
The immediate threat to the crew has been neutralised. A decision has to be made regarding the fate of the Lord Captain's unstable companion.
The immediate threat to the crew has been neutralised. A decision has to be made regarding the fate of the Lord Captain's unstable companion.

languages.text: La menace immédiate pour l'équipage a été neutralisée. Il faut maintenant prendre une décision quant au sort du compagnon instable {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}.
languages.original_text: The immediate threat to the crew has been neutralised. A decision has to be made regarding the fate of the Lord Captain's unstable companion.

traits.locale_text: La menace immédiate pour l'équipage a été neutralisée. Il faut maintenant prendre une décision quant au sort du compagnon instable {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}.

languages.text: 船员已经不再受到直接威胁。至于那位精神状态不稳定的同伴，行商浪人必须立刻决定他的命运。
languages.original_text: The immediate threat to the crew has been neutralised. A decision has to be made regarding the fate of the Lord Captain's unstable companion.

traits.locale_text: 船员已经不再受到直接威胁。至于那位精神状态不稳定的同伴，行商浪人必须立刻决定他的命运。

languages.text: クルーに対する当面の脅威は取り除かれた。ロード・キャプテンの不安定な仲間の運命について、決断を下さなければならない。
languages.original_text: The immediate threat to the crew has been neutralised. A decision has to be made regarding the fate of the Lord Captain's unstable companion.

traits.locale_text: クルーに対する当面の脅威は取り除かれた。ロード・キャプテンの不安定な仲間の運命について、決断を下さなければならない。

languages.text: Die unmittelbare Gefahr für die Crew wurde neutralisiert. Der Lord Captain muss entscheiden, was mit seinem instabilen Gefährten geschehen soll.
languages.original_text: The immediate threat to the crew has been neutralised. A decision has to be made regarding the fate of the Lord Captain's unstable companion.

traits.locale_text: Die unmittelbare Gefahr für die Crew wurde neutralisiert. Der Lord Captain muss entscheiden, was mit seinem instabilen Gefährten geschehen soll.

languages.text: La amenaza inmediata para la tripulación ha sido neutralizada. Solo queda decidir el destino del inestable compañero de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán.
languages.original_text: The immediate threat to the crew has been neutralised. A decision has to be made regarding the fate of the Lord Captain's unstable companion.

traits.locale_text: La amenaza inmediata para la tripulación ha sido neutralizada. Solo queda decidir el destino del inestable compañero de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán.

languages.text: Mürettebata yönelik tehdit ortadan kaldırıldı. Lord Kaptan'ın dengesiz yoldaşının kaderi hakkında bir karar verilmesi gerekiyor.
languages.original_text: The immediate threat to the crew has been neutralised. A decision has to be made regarding the fate of the Lord Captain's unstable companion.
